name: scratch online beta 1.4
description:
a small demo for a new project, online using cloudlink extension by MikeDEV coming soon. the game will have a huge map where you can explore a completely different environment and the game will be set in the future (2032, to be exact)

also demo for another game called new haven set in the 1930s coming soon!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
